name: Endless Runner Port
description:
This is a game made with Godot Game Engine by following a Unity Game Engine Tutorial Series.

Just a game project to reach the limits of Godot, I think you should decide the outcome. It was a lot of fun to understand the logic between 2 game engines.

Use UP and DOWN arrow keys to move the character.

THE ART IS NOT MY OWN, IT IS MADE BY BLACKTHORNPROD
